document.full_text: aeroflot  is studying the possibility of ordering airbus'  revamped and more efficient airliner, the a320neo, the russian flagship airline's chief executive said in an interview.
document.title: aeroflot ceo says "studying" airbus a320neo: report
lines_and_colors: aeroflot  is studying the possibility of ordering airbus'  revamped and more efficient airliner, the a320neo, the russian flagship airline's chief executive said in an interview.
